teamPortalTemplate.title: WL Team Portal
teamPortalTemplate.subtitle: Manage your team, players, fixtures, and revenue

pending.subject: Registration Received - {teamName}
pending.body:
Dear {coachName},

Thank you for submitting your team registration for {teamName}.

We have received your registration and it is currently in the queue to be reviewed by our admin team.

Registration ID: #{registrationId}
Status: Pending Review

You will receive another email once your registration has been reviewed by the WL admin team.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Winter League Cricket

reviewed.subject: Registration Under Review - {teamName}
reviewed.body:
Dear {coachName},

Your team registration for {teamName} has been reviewed by the WL admin team. 

Registration ID: #{registrationId}
Status: Your application has been reviewed 

If we require any further information we will be in touch with you shortly. 

If we do not require further information, you will then receive a final confirmation email with details to access your team portal.

Best regards,
Winter League Cricket
